price: This is an exhortation for mankind; a guidance and admonition for the righteous.
arabic: هَٰذَا بَيَانٞ لِّلنَّاسِ وَهُدٗى وَمَوۡعِظَةٞ لِّلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
